about_the_game:
● Story introduction

"But when you do evil, don't ask for retribution."
He just wanted to revenge the society. He thought so and did evil things.

Because of injustice and abandonment by the society, the fate of social animals should be like this. However, people educated in this highly civilized society can never achieve the so-called revenge.
This is the last story of my life in the few days left after my resignation. To be exact, it is about the encounter between the "I" who has no future and the "she" who yearns for the future.

● Introduction to the game

This is a character adventure game based on the real society. The player, as the former employee of the company, will decide the fate of "me" and "her" according to different choices.

● Production personnel:

Producer · Script · Performance · Program · UI · Artist · Sound Effect · Music · Editing · Release: Ogasawara

Staff: Zhenbai, Fengban, Ogasawara

Original CG: Yingfeng, Ogasawara

Main interface CG: Xiaoyue, Ogasawara

Search route:
Just try to avoid detours and find all the scenes.

If there is no plot with a non-male perspective, please go through the return line once, and it has the function of directly jumping to the next option.
Now, the file will not be deleted and can also be read normally, but the file will not inherit the unlocking after the file is returned. If there is a need, you can deliberately bypass the file entry point and skip into a short story from a non-male perspective.

content_descriptors.notes: There are very mild violence and suggestive plots, no direct sexual behavior, no bare key parts, and no intuitive description of bloody violence.
